CompanyPage.ceo_message_content:
Dear Valued Customers and Partners,

I extend my warmest greetings to you on behalf of Daechang Machinery Industry Co., Ltd. For decades, Daechang has been at the forefront of the industrial machinery sector, driven by a relentless pursuit of innovation and an unwavering commitment to quality. We specialize in advanced Blow Molding Machines and Extrusion Lines, solutions that power numerous industries worldwide.

Our journey has been one of continuous growth, fueled by our dedicated team and the trust you place in our products. We believe that true success is measured not just by technological advancement, but by the lasting relationships we build and the positive impact we make on your operations. As we look to the future, we reaffirm our pledge to deliver cutting-edge technology, exceptional reliability, and unparalleled customer service.

Thank you for choosing Daechang as your partner in progress. We are excited to continue this journey with you, innovating and building a more productive future together.

Sincerely,

[CEO Name]
CEO, Daechang Machinery Industry Co., Ltd.

PrivacyPolicy.section1_content: Daechang Machine Ind. Co., Ltd. collects personal information for the following purposes, and the collected information is not used for purposes other than those intended.
PrivacyPolicy.section2_content: The company collects the following personal information for smooth customer consultation.

PrivacyPolicy.section3_title: 3. Period of Retention and Use of Personal Information
PrivacyPolicy.section3_content: In principle, after the purpose of collecting and using personal information is achieved, the information is destroyed without delay. However, if it is necessary to preserve it under the relevant laws and regulations, the company retains the information for a certain period set by the relevant laws and regulations.
PrivacyPolicy.section3_list1: Records on consumer complaints or dispute handling: 3 years
PrivacyPolicy.section4_title: 4. Use of Personal Information and Provision to Third Parties
PrivacyPolicy.section4_content: The company does not provide users' personal information to the outside in principle. However, exceptions are made in cases where users have agreed in advance or in accordance with the provisions of laws and regulations.
PrivacyPolicy.section5_content: The company designates a Personal Information Protection Officer as follows to oversee business related to personal information processing and to handle complaints and damage relief of data subjects related to personal information processing.
